name: Hachiko (CanadianHobo)
description:
Can you survive as long as Hachikō, the true companion and pet?  Stay alive against the environment and angry shopkeepers.  Based on the Japanese story of an Akita dog that waited for his owner, Professor Hidesaburō Ueno, at the Shibuya Station.  

Controls:

Arrows: movement; E: interact with buildings

NOTES:

Because of time, if there are inaccurates or any additional events related to Hachikō; please comment below with source.
